text:
Anyone can help me with email integration?
I want to check the status of an email via route <https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/email/send-statuses/><STATUS_ID>

I got an error back that there is no scope of “transactional-email”.
I checked twice and also opened a new app with the scope of “transactional-email” and I am getting the same error.
Where I am wrong?
